entry.def: If you describe something such as a theory or a work of art as reductive, you disapprove of it because it reduces complex things to simple elements.

example.tran: 愤世嫉俗的简单化解释

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by or causing diminution or curtailment;

sentences.sentence: "their views of life were reductive and depreciabory" - R.H.Rovere
